title: Soraka hairband glitch.
body:
The celestial skin, which happens to be my favorite, has a glitch going on where the left wing of her hairband is literally stabbing her in the back... @_@ 

{{champion:16}}

replies.body:
Hey! 

It's funny you should bring this up! I was sifting through backlog bugs, as we try to square some away each patch, and this was one of the one's I'd plucked out. Now, if this is a fairly quick fix, we *should* be able to get this in for next patch, so 7.16. :)

Oh awesome!!! I love the new SG skins series, have them all! <3

But celestial is special, can't wait to bring it back! :D
